00041 CMDIArea::CMDIArea(QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00042     : QWorkspace(parent, name) {            
00043     m_childEvent = false;
00044   m_deleting = false;
00045     guiOption = Nothing;
00046     m_appCaption = QString::null;
00047     
00048     initView();
00049     initConnections();
00050     readSettings();
00051 }
00052 
00053 CMDIArea::~CMDIArea(){
00054 }

00057 void CMDIArea::initView(){
00058     QWhatsThis::add(this, WT_MDI_AREA_WIDGET );
00059     setPaletteBackgroundColor( parentWidget()->paletteBackgroundColor() );  
00060 }
00061 
00063 void CMDIArea::initConnections(){
00064     connect(this, SIGNAL(windowActivated(QWidget*)),
00065         this, SLOT(slotClientActivated(QWidget*)));
00066 }
00067 
00069 void CMDIArea::slotClientActivated(QWidget* client){
00070 //  qWarning("CMDIArea::slotClientActivated(QWidget* client)");
00071     if (!client || !isUpdatesEnabled()) {
00072 //      qWarning("client Activated: return");
00073     return;
00074   }
00075 
00076     CDisplayWindow* sp = dynamic_cast<CDisplayWindow*>(client); 
00077     if (sp && !sp->isReady())
00078         return;
00079 
00080   QWidgetList windows = windowList();
00081   for ( QWidget* w = windows.first(); w; w = windows.next() ) {     
00082     CDisplayWindow* window = dynamic_cast<CDisplayWindow*>(w);  
00083         window->windowActivated( (window == sp) ? true : false);
00084     }   
00085     
00086     emit sigSetToplevelCaption( ( m_appCaption = client->caption().stripWhiteSpace() ) );   
00087 
00088 #warning Check!
00089 //  CBiblePresenter* p = dynamic_cast<CBiblePresenter*>(client);
00090 //  if (p && p->keyChooser())
00091 //      syncCommentaries( p->keyChooser()->key() );
00092 }
00093 
00095 void CMDIArea::childEvent( QChildEvent * e ){
00096     QWorkspace::childEvent(e);
00097 
00098     if ( m_childEvent || !isUpdatesEnabled() || !e)
00099         return; 
00100 
00101     m_childEvent = true;
00102     
00103     if (!windowList().count()) {
00104         m_appCaption = QString::null;
00105         emit sigSetToplevelCaption( KApplication::kApplication()->makeStdCaption(m_appCaption) );       
00106         emit sigLastPresenterClosed();
00107     }   
00108     
00109   if (!m_deleting && (e->inserted() || e->removed()) ) {
00110         switch (guiOption) {
00111             case autoTile:
00112                 if (isUpdatesEnabled())
00113                     tile();
00114                 break;
00115             case autoCascade:
00116                 if (isUpdatesEnabled())
00117                     cascade();
00118                 break;
00119             default:
00120                 break;
00121         }
00122     }
00123 
00124   m_childEvent = false;
00125   if (!windowList().count()) { //already deleted all windows
00126     m_deleting = false;
00127   }
00128 }
00129 
00131 void CMDIArea::resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* e){    
00132     QWorkspace::resizeEvent(e); 
00133     switch (guiOption) {
00134         case autoTile:
00135             if (isUpdatesEnabled())
00136                 tile();
00137             break;
00138         case autoCascade:
00139             if (isUpdatesEnabled())
00140                 cascade();
00141             break;
00142         default:
00143             break;
00144     }
00145 }

00156 void CMDIArea::deleteAll(){ 
00157   m_deleting = true;
00158   QWidgetList windows = windowList();
00159   windows.setAutoDelete(true);
00160   windows.clear();
00161 }

00164 void CMDIArea::setGUIOption( mdiOption new_GUIOption){
00165     guiOption = new_GUIOption;
00166     //now do the initial action
00167     
00168     switch (guiOption) {
00169         case autoTile:
00170             if (isUpdatesEnabled())
00171                 tile();
00172             break;
00173         case autoCascade:
00174             if (isUpdatesEnabled())
00175                 cascade();
00176             break;
00177         default:
00178             break;
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00183 void CMDIArea::tile(){
00184 //  qWarning("CMDIArea::tile()");
00185     if (!isUpdatesEnabled() || !windowList().count() )  
00186         return;
00187 
00188     if (windowList().count() == 1 && windowList().at(0)) {
00189         m_appCaption = windowList().at(0)->caption();
00190         windowList().at(0)->showMaximized();
00191     }
00192     else
00193         QWorkspace::tile();
00194 }
00195 
00197 void CMDIArea::cascade(){
00198 //  qWarning("CMDIArea::cascade()");
00199     if (!isUpdatesEnabled() || !windowList().count() )
00200         return;     
00201     if (windowList().count() == 1 && windowList().at(0)) {  
00202         m_appCaption = windowList().at(0)->caption();       
00203         windowList().at(0)->showMaximized();
00204     }
00205     else
00206         QWorkspace::cascade();
00207 }
